name: Quiet Town
description:
collect ,explore, build, farm, fight and cooking,explore difference biomes,beat different strange creatures collect loots or tame them,collect multiple resouces,mining,forage,craft all sort of item or tools or construction to survival longer,enjoy this strange world.

Features:
  • explore world to Discover distinct environments with unique enemies to battle and GATHER materials using crafted tools.
  • find crop seed or fruit tree, feed animal you captured from wild .take care your farm
  • find or craft weapon , armor , accessory to explorer further or fighting in the dungeon.
build a large base and defend it or just wander this world using some small camp site.

Trading
use item you craft or delicious food you cooked to trade with npc.

Build, fight, farm and explore. Experience your own path. Whether it's building the home of your dreams, tending to your crops and watching the sun go down; or explore the mysteries of the Island and the darkness underneath, but you may want to take a sword with you.

this game is a single player game,no plan to add multi-player support.
